entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
